about_the_game:
Guide a monkey across a forest to find a fallen star!

  • Meet interesting, amusing, and occasionally hostile characters who may help or hinder you.
  • Choose from three different companions - including an owl and a tortoise - whose unique characteristics open up new possibilities, or try going solo!
  • Find items that you can use to replenish your health, solve your problems, or decorate your home.
  • Gain experience and discover new abilities as you level up.
  • See different outcomes depending on your choices, and unlock four different endings!

Playtime: About 20-30 minutes.

Note: This game was made for the Touch The Stars game jam (hosted by Komodo), where it won 3rd prize!
detailed_description:
RPG Maker MZ Game Jam "Touch the Stars"

Forest Star won third place in the official RPG Maker MZ Game Jam "Touch the Stars."


About the Game

Guide a monkey across a forest to find a fallen star!

  • Meet interesting, amusing, and occasionally hostile characters who may help or hinder you.
  • Choose from three different companions - including an owl and a tortoise - whose unique characteristics open up new possibilities, or try going solo!
  • Find items that you can use to replenish your health, solve your problems, or decorate your home.
  • Gain experience and discover new abilities as you level up.
  • See different outcomes depending on your choices, and unlock four different endings!

Playtime: About 20-30 minutes.

Note: This game was made for the Touch The Stars game jam (hosted by Komodo), where it won 3rd prize!
name: Forest Star

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL
  • Storage: 262 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MZ

short_description: Help a monkey find a fallen star in this short adventure game! Meet and recruit other animals, find useful items, and discover new abilities. Multiple endings available depending on your choices!
